description.value: Your body is covered in thick, plated bark. Your bark is medium armor in the plate armor group that grants a +4 item bonus to AC, has a Dex cap of +1, a check penalty of –2, a Speed penalty of –5 feet, a Strength value of +3, and has the bulwark, comfort, and exposed traits. You can never wear other armor or remove the bark. You can etch armor runes onto the bark.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
